summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for August 10, 2019. It documents the operational status and key incident of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) being found unresponsive in his cell and transported to an outside hospital for treatment.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054, found unresponsive in his cell in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and escorted to an outside hospital for treatment.

events.title: Epstein Found Unresponsive
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York. He was subsequently escorted to an outside hospital for treatment.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on August 10, 2019.
He was transported to an outside hospital for treatment following the incident.
The report indicates operational issues, including a shortage of staff and an inoperative fire panel in the Control Center.
The document is a routine prison operations log that captured the initial report of the incident leading to Epstein's death.
